DragonFly::

DragonFly moved backwards and fired 25 shots towards Hot rod's chest, 
after that he screamed "Then the IGL is the witness that just the 
winner will leave alive the arena..."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He looks at Dragonfly. 
> "You had to ask for that before. The IGL says you cant fight to the
> death. But after I kick your ass here, and we're on are own time, 
I'd be
> happy to send you to your maker!"
> 
> He moves in, sending a high kick at Dragonfly's jaw.
